# Kaveesh Senevirathne — Complete Portfolio Information

> Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer | Cloud & AI Enthusiast
> Website: https://kaveesh.cv
> Email: khsenevirathne@gmail.com
> Phone: +94 76 5350039
> Location: Galle, Sri Lanka

---

## Professional Summary

Results-driven Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications, cloud microservices, and AI-integrated solutions. Proven track record delivering high-impact projects serving millions of users, including national-scale news platforms, live-streaming systems, and real-time election coverage. Proficient across the full stack with expertise in Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, Spring Boot, React, Next.js, and AWS. Experienced with AI/ML tools and modern AI-assisted development workflows using GitHub Copilot, Cursor, LangChain, and OpenAI APIs.

---

## Professional Experience

### Software Engineer — SeekaHost (Oct 2025 – Present)
Location: London, United Kingdom (Remote)
- Building and maintaining cloud-based microservices architecture on AWS
- Developing scalable backend services using C# and TypeScript
- Implementing RESTful APIs with Swagger documentation
Technologies: AWS, Microservices, C#, TypeScript, Swagger API

### Software Engineer — ClickDo (Mar 2025 – Present)
Location: London, United Kingdom (Remote)
- Integrating front-end and server-side components with Next.js to maximize SEO performance
- Building production-grade web applications for UK-based clients
- Implementing automated testing and optimizing web performance
Technologies: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, SEO, WordPress

### Associate IT Executive — Wave Beach Resort (Jan 2024 – Feb 2025)
Location: Sri Lanka (Contract)
- Administered websites and internal applications on a contractual basis
- Developed Billing & Payment Analytics Dashboard for financial insights
- Led Booking System Optimization Initiative improving guest experience
- Implemented Internal System Process Automation reducing manual tasks
- Managed network infrastructure, security, and server administration
Technologies: IT Support, Network Admin, System Admin, Database Management, Cyber Security

### Software Engineer — Capital Maharaja Group (Jan 2023 – Aug 2023)
Location: Colombo, Sri Lanka (Full-time)
- Developed and maintained multiple production web applications including national news platforms
- Built real-time election coverage systems and live-streaming platforms serving millions of users
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies
- Managed cloud deployments with CI/CD pipelines and containerization
Technologies: Spring Boot, Angular, Next.js, Node.js, Docker, Jenkins

### Software Engineer Intern — Arya Labs Ltd (Nov 2022 – Jan 2023)
Location: Remote (Internship)
- Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using Angular and .NET Core
- Built a feature-rich dating application with Flutter for cross-platform deployment
- Gained hands-on experience in SEO optimization and e-commerce best practices
Technologies: Angular, .NET Core, Flutter, MongoDB, SEO

### Freelance Web & Graphic Designer — Fiverr (Jan 2022 – Nov 2022)
Location: Remote (Freelance)
- Delivered high-quality web development and graphic design solutions to clients worldwide
- Successfully completed multiple projects with positive client feedback
- Built responsive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and modern frameworks
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, Web Design

---

## Projects

### Election 2023 — Newsfirst (Capital Maharaja Group)
Comprehensive election coverage and analysis platform providing real-time results, transparent ad management, and live updates with accuracy for all types of elections across Sri Lanka.
Tech: Angular Material, Next.js, Node.js, Spring Boot

### Newsfirst.lk Websites (Capital Maharaja Group)
Multi-platform news delivery system providing precise and impartial news to the entire population of Sri Lanka through an online media platform.
Tech: Next.js, Spring Boot, Angular, Bootstrap, MySQL

### Cricket World Cup 2023 Live Stream (Capital Maharaja Group)
Professional live-streaming platform for CWC 2023 matches serving 1M+ concurrent users with uninterrupted, high-quality streaming.
Tech: Spring Boot, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySQL

### Eva Millionaire Dreams — Season 2 (Capital Maharaja Group)
QR Code Lottery and SMS Gateway integration system for data capture, validation, and customer coupon delivery.
Tech: PHP (Laravel), Bootstrap, MySQL

### Digital Transformation — Hotel Operations (Wave Beach Resort)
Billing & Payment Analytics Dashboard, Room Booking System Optimization, Internal Systems Process Automation, and Network Infrastructure Enhancement.
Tech: Web Admin, Dashboard, Payment Integration, Automation

### Digital Products Management System (IJSE)
Digital Product Management System for organizing, storing, and managing digital content with metadata tagging, categorization, and access control.
Tech: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js (MERN Stack)

### Machine Learning Projects (Personal)
Collection of ML projects: Image Classification using Deep Learning, Laptop Price Prediction, Gold Inflation prediction.
Tech: Python, Jupyter, TensorFlow, Machine Learning

### E-Commerce Platform (Arya Labs Ltd)
Full-featured e-commerce platform with product listings, shopping carts, secure payment gateways, and order tracking.
Tech: Angular, .NET Core, MongoDB

### Dating Application (Arya Labs Ltd)
Feature-rich dating app with real-time chat, matching algorithms, and secure authentication.
Tech: Flutter, Firebase, Dart

### Fiverr Web Designer Projects (Freelance)
10+ web development and graphic design projects for clients worldwide including hotel websites, portfolios, and fitness gym websites.
Tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, Figma

### Car Rental System (IJSE)
Software application for booking and managing rental cars with search, reservations, payments, and tracking.
Tech: Java, JavaFX, MySQL

### Pharmacy Management System (IJSE)
Web application for pharmacy operations: inventory management, prescription processing, sales tracking.
Tech: Spring MVC, Java, MySQL, Bootstrap

### Live Chat Application (IJSE)
Real-time text-based communication application with instant messaging, chat history, and file sharing.
Tech: Java, Socket Programming, Client-Server

### Programming Languages
Java (Expert), JavaScript (Expert), TypeScript (Advanced), CSS/SASS (Advanced), SQL (Advanced), Python (Intermediate), PHP (Intermediate), C# (Intermediate)

### AI & Machine Learning
OpenAI API, LangChain, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), Prompt Engineering, TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, Jupyter, GitHub Copilot, Cursor, Claude AI, ChatGPT

### DevOps & Cloud
AWS, Docker, Jenkins, Ansible, Apache Tomcat, Apache, CI/CD, Serverless, Windows Server, Linux Server

### Databases
MySQL, MongoDB, Microsoft SQL Server

### Tools & Platforms

### IDEs
IntelliJ IDEA, VS Code, Cursor, Android Studio

### Operating Systems
